game.name: SYMMETRY
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 연구 우주선이 버려진 행성에 불시착했습니다. 이곳의 모든 것은 보이는 모습과 그 실체가 다르며 상황은 순식간에 통제할 수 없게 되었습니다. 승무원들이 살아남아 집으로 돌아갈 수 있을까요?
game.shortDescriptionEn: A research spaceship reaches an abandoned planet. Nothing is what it seems here and the situation quickly slips out of control. Can the crew manage to survive and get back home?

reviewHighlights.text: SYMMETRY is a stark, pressure-driven survival experience developed by Sleepless Clinic and published by IMGN.PRO that places players in an unforgiving...
The premise is good – a group of astronauts, who are strapped on a hostile planet after a crash, with most crew still missing, are trying to escape. U...
